analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/36/0x9bea694bcc69453e4b2e5a80476fb1ea6d29711e.sol:

Parameter '_spender' of BetcoinICO.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/36/0x9bea694bcc69453e4b2e5a80476fb1ea6d29711e.sol#238-239) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_spender' of BetcoinICO.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/36/0x9bea694bcc69453e4b2e5a80476fb1ea6d29711e.sol#257) is not in mixedCase
